subject: Request for Feedback on Q2 Marketing Plan Draft

content:

subject: Clarification Needed on Q2 Travel Policy Updates
content:
Hi team,

I’ve been reviewing the updated Q2 travel policy released yesterday and had a few questions regarding the section on pre-approval for international travel. Specifically, it mentions that all trips must be pre-approved using Concur, but the steps for multi-leg journeys aren’t entirely clear. 

Could someone (perhaps Sagar or Ellen from HR) clarify whether we need separate approval forms for each segment, or if one submission covers the full itinerary? I’d like to ensure I’m compliant before booking my trip to the Zurich office in May.

Thanks in advance for any guidance you can provide. The link I’m referencing is here: https://intranet.example.com/hr/travel-policy

Best,
Alice
